snippet: Two dozen masked men stormed one of the city’s most popular gay bars early Thursday and beat patrons — most of them women — with fists and bottles.
abstract: Russian police in Moscow are seeking two dozen masked men who stormed one of  city’s most popular gay bars and beat patrons, most of them women, with fists and bottles; more than 10 people are injured, and three women and a man are hospitalized.
lead_paragraph: Two dozen masked men stormed one of the city’s most popular gay bars early Thursday and beat patrons — most of them women — with fists and bottles.

headline.seo: Moscow Gay Bar Attacked by Two Dozen Masked Men
headline.main: Masked Men Attack Crowd at a Gay Bar in Moscow
headline.print_headline: Masked Men Attack Crowd At a Gay Bar In Moscow
